projects.title: MARO Cognitive Security Platform
projects.summary: Contributed to a cognitive security platform reducing human risk through behavioral modeling and policy enforcement.
highlights: Developed JavaScript-based clickjacking detection logic for browser extension UI protection
Built robust pytest suites supporting stable CI/CD deployments via GitHub
Engineered API workflows using Python and SQL for real-time behavioral data processing
Collaborated cross-functionally with engineering, product, and design teams

projects.title: Incident Response Program Maturation
projects.summary: Assisted Sony Pictures Entertainment in maturing IR capabilities through automation and process refinement.
highlights: Supported IR events across corporate and subsidiary environments
Developed incident response playbooks and knowledge base documentation
Implemented new alerts and detection controls with Threat Intelligence teams
Collected and analyzed forensic data during active incidents
Focused on automation to improve IR response efficiency

projects.title: CSULB Cybersecurity Club Leadership
projects.summary: Established and led campus cybersecurity community, driving engagement and CTF participation.
highlights: Managed club operations and organized CTF competition participation
Implemented strategies to enhance member engagement and collaborative learning
Built inclusive environment fostering hands-on cybersecurity skill development
Currently leading 100+ members in security research and competitions

projects.title: Blue Team Splunk Log Analysis
projects.summary: Developed advanced Splunk scripts and dashboards for SIEM log analysis, threat detection, and incident investigation.
highlights: Created custom Splunk searches and SPL scripts for real-time threat detection
Developed automated dashboards for security metrics and KPI tracking
Implemented correlation rules for multi-stage attack detection
Optimized log ingestion and search performance for large-scale environments

projects.title: Computer Forensics Analysis
projects.summary: Hands-on experience in digital forensics investigation, evidence collection, and chain-of-custody procedures.
highlights: Conducted disk imaging and analysis using forensic tools (EnCase, FTK, Autopsy)
Recovered deleted files and examined file systems (NTFS, FAT32, ext4)
Analyzed browser history, cache, and user artifacts
Generated forensic reports for legal and compliance purposes
Documented chain-of-custody for legal proceedings

projects.title: Metasploit Penetration Testing
projects.summary: Conducted vulnerability assessments and penetration testing using Metasploit Framework for security validation.
highlights: Developed custom Metasploit modules for targeted exploitation
Performed network reconnaissance and vulnerability scanning
Executed multi-stage payload delivery and exploitation
Documented exploitation paths and created remediation recommendations
Conducted proof-of-concept demonstrations for security weaknesses

projects.title: Arch Linux System Administration
projects.summary: Expert configuration and hardening of Arch Linux systems for security, performance, and stability.
highlights: Installed and configured minimal Arch Linux systems from scratch
Implemented kernel hardening and system security controls
Managed package management with pacman and AUR
Configured firewalls (ufw, iptables) and network services
Optimized system performance and troubleshot Linux kernel issues
Implemented user management and file system encryption (LUKS)
